医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
美国癌症长期幸存者的肿瘤和非肿瘤死亡率的相对负担是多少？在最近的一项研究中，研究人员估计了癌症长期幸存者的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/What-is-the-relative-burden-of-oncologic-and-nononcologic-mortality-among-long-term-survivors-of-cancer-in- the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/What-is-the-relative-burden-of-oncologic-and-nononcologic-mortality-among-long-term-survivors-of-cancer-in- the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4140da47-5492-4e65-a4d5-280019f97703 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:30:00 -0400 What is the relative burden of oncologic and nononcologic mortality among long-term survivors of cancer in the US?
气道上皮的作用：深入了解哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺病的发病机制研究讨论了气道上皮损伤和异常修复如何导致慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD）和哮喘。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-role-of-airway-epithelium-insights-into-asthma-and-COPD-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-role-of-airway-epithelium-insights-into-asthma-and-COPD-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49f6b525-7fdd-4ac8-9b90-15471480f8e0 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:29:00 -0400 The role of airway epithelium: insights into asthma and COPD pathogenesis
机器学习在快速 LRTI 诊断方面的潜力一组研究人员评估了预测模型在 LRTI 诊断中的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Machine-learnings-pottial-for-rapid-LRTI-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Machine-learnings-pottial-for-rapid-LRTI-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efe3036a-b379-4d77-9b7a-defd5d9e3883 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:22:00 -0400 Machine learning's potential for rapid LRTI diagnosis
促进遗传性视网膜营养不良基因诊断的新协议巴塞罗那大学附属公司 DBGen Ocular Genomics 与西班牙诺华公司之间达成的协议将能够对受影响患者的色素性视网膜炎 (RP) 和莱伯先天性黑蒙 (LCA) 进行基因鉴定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-agreement-to-facilitate-genic-diagnosis-of-hereditary-retinal-dystrophies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-agreement-to-facilitate-genic-diagnosis-of-hereditary-retinal-dystrophies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ac31e50-4c92-4646-87ae-4a9be6cd4380 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:21:28 -0400 New agreement to facilitate genetic diagnosis of hereditary retinal dystrophies
新方法改善了肝病进展的预测维也纳医科大学医学三系和维也纳大学医院的一个研究小组进行了一项大规模研究，表明通过一种新方法进行重复肝脏评估的重要价值，可以显着改善慢性肝病患者的风险评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-method-improves-prediction-of-liver-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-method-improves-prediction-of-liver-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f02ef3f-742c-40d8-ab96-87c4e72f1df4 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:08:22 -0400 New method improves prediction of liver disease progression
探索局部利多卡因对慢性颈部疼痛患者的疗效一组研究人员研究了利多卡因治疗颈部疼痛的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Exploring-the-efficacy-of-topical-lidocaine-in-individuals-with-chronic-neck-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Exploring-the-efficacy-of-topical-lidocaine-in-individuals-with-chronic-neck-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e2ae62d-3f7b-4d42-b51c-1ecd8d182263 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:03:00 -0400 Exploring the efficacy of topical lidocaine in individuals with chronic neck pain

华大智造在第二十三届国际遗传学大会上发起革命性的假设活动，赋能生命科学行业华大智造（MGI）是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，今天宣布启动名为“What If？”的全球品牌活动。第二十三届国际遗传学大会 (ICG)，这是一个五年一度的会议，汇聚了来自世界各地的国际遗传学界。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/MGI-Empowers-Life-Sciences-Industry-with-Revolutionary-What-If-Campaign-at-XXIIIrd-International-Congress-of-Genetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/MGI-Empowers-Life-Sciences-Industry-with-Revolutionary-What-If-Campaign-at-XXIIIrd-International-Congress-of-Genetics.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d333594-1863-42fd-b440-d24373dc339e Mon, 17 Jul 2023 07:48:00 -0400 MGI Empowers Life Sciences Industry with Revolutionary What If Campaign at XXIIIrd International Congress of Genetics
揭示后果：COVID-19 对结核病护理级联的破坏性影响研究人员评估了 2019 年冠状病毒病对结核病护理级联的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Unraveling-the-consequences-COVID-19s-devastating-effect-on-the-TB-care-cascade.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Unraveling-the-consequences-COVID-19s-devastating-effect-on-the-TB-care-cascade.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4fe81cd-a240-483d-861b-d7eec5fbc520 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 06:49:00 -0400 Unraveling the consequences: COVID-19's devastating effect on the TB care cascade
对于老年人来说，体重稍微超重并不是一件坏事数以百万计的人进入晚年时体重会增加 10 至 15 磅，这是他们在生孩子、出现关节问题、变得不那么活跃或将膳食作为社交生活中心后增加的体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/In-older-adults-a-little-excess-weight-isne28099t-such-a-bad-thing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/In-older-adults-a-little-excess-weight-isne28099t-such-a-bad-thing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38033d3e-f225-4153-ab45-1f77f9ee7619 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 06:41:44 -0400 In older adults, a little excess weight isn’t such a bad thing
